title: Online Science Inquiry Report Analysis and Integrated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Scientific Concepts and Report Comprehension Skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment using digital devices, enhancing science inquiry skills linked to social studies curriculum

learning_goals: Learners can analyze textual and graphical information in web-based science reports with 80% accuracy.
Learners can identify and explain at least three inter-referencing patterns between textual and graphical information.
Learners can engage in scientifically investigating social issues like climate change with 90% participation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
